participant_1.background:
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.
My dream is to travel the world and take pictures of my journey.
I like to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian trail.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.

participant_2.background:
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.
my parents met at woodstock.
I love making people happy with my music.
I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.

content.text: What was your favorite part of your childhood?
I have so many great memories of playing in the creek with my friends. The water was always so clean and refreshing.
That sounds amazing, I wish I had grown up near a creek. I live in the city now, but I love to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian Trail when I get the chance.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been hiking before, but I'd love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and see some amazing scenery.
I'm sure I would love it. I'm pretty adventurous and I love being outdoors.
Me too! I'm a city girl at heart, but I love to get out and explore nature.
I'm the same way. I love the hustle and bustle of the city, but I also love to get away and relax in the wilderness.
I'm glad we have that in common. We should definitely go hiking sometime!
That would be awesome! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I am free this weekend too! Let's do it
